Name: NARRATOR
Text: Ehhh hi! I was in the forest yesterday where Wood Cut Co was logging.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: I got your address from the employment agency.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: That remote saw of yours really hurt some of my friends!

Name: NARRATOR
Text: I have a proposition for you. Install this addon onto your phone.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: It gives you a new tool. Try it out today, please.
